name: Metaficial World
description: Metaficial World is a Play To Earn, Gaming Metaverse Token, Launched on Binance Smart Chain and is the second IDO completed on UnityPAD. On the blockchain, our token aspires to give play to earn open world real life. Allowing users to immerse themselves in a vast world and experience the thrill of strategic gameplay in the world of metaficial you can design and create your own character, do in game activities which generate experience and increase the level of your character. you can also purchase items (properties, collectibles, vehicles, clothing, accessories), browse items listed on the marketplace and much more all whilst earning stable USDT, BUSD and UNITYCOM tokens. players can also interact with each other, request friendship, gift items, create groups, send and receive mail, and participate in contests. There are some "special" items in metaficial world. These may include vehicles, mystery boxes, collectibles, nfts, residency passes and much more. Metaficial World (MW) token would be used as native token for the Metaficial World Game, only holders will be able to benefit and generate passive income (USDT, BUSD) by their weight of holding. Our native token MW is also a deflationary and reward-based token which means that the circulating supply will continuously decrease on each transaction whilst the holders get rewarded with extra MW tokens.
